definitions.definition: The three-dimensional analogue of a pixel; a volume element representing some numerical quantity , such as the colour , of a point in three-dimensional space , used in the visualisation and analysis of three-dimensional (especially scientific and medical ) data.

main_definition: ( computer graphics ) The three-dimensional analogue of a pixel; a volume element representing some numerical quantity , such as the colour , of a point in three-dimensional space , used in the visualisation and analysis of three-dimensional (especially scientific and medical ) data.
